modName: Undead Pack The - Dead Have Color Too
summary: More Color fun with the Undead!
descriptionHtml:
These Files Modify the Following Textures (Creatures):

dragon priest
draugr
skeleton

and

These Files Modify the Following Textures (armor):
draugrs
skeletons

What's Been Done:

Armor/Clothes have been Brightened and Washed in some Omo!

The Dragon Priest & Draugr have had some Color injected into them.
You will also note that the Draugr have two colors - Light blue
for the male & Light Pink for the Ladies...

The Skeleton have been whitened a bit.

All you need to do is to copy the Folder Textures to your data folder under Skyrim.

Requirements - Vanilla Skyrim Or with any/All Dlc's.
NOT TESTED ON SPECIAL EDITION!!! I Still have to download/Install my Special Edition
version.

Â 2017-5-17

Unfortunately this will have been the last file I uploaded on this site.
I've only been doing these files for my husband, who has been stuggling with his health for the last 3 or so years.
Sadly, he has pased away on march 29 2017.
I miss you, my love.
author: FF - FlatFoot
